title: Physical Descriptions
content:
# Physical Descriptions in Spanish

## Adjectives for Appearance
- alto/baja - tall/short
- delgado/gordo - thin/fat
- joven/viejo - young/old
- guapo/feo - handsome/ugly
- rubio/moreno - blonde/dark-haired

## Grammar Points
- Adjective agreement (gender and number)
- Position of adjectives
- Ser vs. Estar with descriptions

## Practice Exercises
1. Describe people's physical appearance
2. Practice adjective agreement
3. Create character descriptions

title: Personality Traits
content:
# Personality Descriptions in Spanish

## Character Traits
- simpático/antipático - nice/unpleasant
- inteligente/tonto - smart/silly
- trabajador/perezoso - hardworking/lazy
- divertido/aburrido - fun/boring
- tímido/sociable - shy/outgoing

## Practice Exercises
1. Describe your personality
2. Compare different personalities
3. Write about your best friend

title: Places and Objects
content:
# Describing Places and Objects

## Location Words
- cerca/lejos - near/far
- dentro/fuera - inside/outside
- encima/debajo - on top/under
- delante/detrás - in front/behind

## Object Descriptions
- grande/pequeño - big/small
- nuevo/viejo - new/old
- limpio/sucio - clean/dirty
- caro/barato - expensive/cheap

## Practice Exercises
1. Describe your house/apartment
2. Give directions using location words
3. Describe objects in a room
